reviews: Very good suction , Use it in my car & on my furniture
I like this product. Small, light, easy to use and affordable. Comes with attachments which were useful for vacum difficult area in my car.

This vacuum is lightweight, and east to move around to your car or if you want to vacuum anything at home. I mostly use it on my car. I like that it is portable and you don't need to connect anything to your car outlet. I just charge this at home , and it lasts me like about 30 min. I is very powerful , so picks up everything. I also like that it has no bag. Just empty the dusk cup and good to go. Overall good product for the money!!

I got this couple of days ago and have been using it in my car most of the time. It's so much more powerful and it sucks up dirt pretty good. It can clean hard to reach corners. Used it on my sofa as well and worked out great.

Battery is good, flushing container is super easy.
Good suction for the size. Gets pet hair out of carpet. Battery life is sufficient to clean entire car. Small size gets in all the tight crevices

To be honest I have had handheld vacuums that had much more suction power than this one. Not saying that I need it to be super strong but, this one was definitely kind of weak even. It's good for small areas like if you needed to vacuum a keyboard but if you were even to do the interior of your car, I am not sure how well that would turn out. So far, I am only using it in those small areas since the suction power isn't that great.

I needed a light and portable vacuum to clean my car and this one did an ok job. The suction power isn't overly powerful and I had to go back and forth a few times to pick up all the debris. The battery life is also good if you don't have to vacuum for too long. The vacuum in general is comfortable to grip and it is easy to use.
Has everything needed to pickup small messes and vacuum out my car.
Bought for my car,  it is very easy to use and easy to clean!

Surprisingly, very lightweight. At first use I found it very easy to use not very loud.. it has just the right suctioning power. One of the good things about this is that it plugs into a USB port, which Iâ€™m finding a lot of equipment nowadays is using.. The vaccum charged pretty fast within 20 minutes. I would say Iâ€™m not sure if thatâ€™s full power, but it was enough to get me started. The charge provided me the ability to vacuum my entire car without powering down, so I would say the 20 minutes was ample enough charge. If youâ€™re looking for something lightweight and easy to handle this is definitely for you.

Why on this green Earth did I wait so long to get one of these?!?! Iâ€™ve known for years that one would be useful. I just never imagined HOW useful.

It cleaned my baseboards, by heat register grill, a rice flour spill, and sugar. Sugar, people.

It got cobwebs and crevices in my couch. It worked wonders on my drapes! It cleaned the carpets in my car! The attachments all work! I LOVE this vacuum!

Add to that emptying thi bagless vac couldnâ€™t be easier, or more mess free.

Bottom line: looking for a handheld vacuum for your car? Buy this. Looking for a vacuum for your home? Buy another one! Buy one for every level! You will use this much, much more than you think you will. Highly, highly recommended!
